dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LENNY, a shy nervous man stands by the window. He peers o at the street below. Searches for something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NADYA, a beautiful woman approaches the apartment buildin a hurry. Upset, she keeps her head low.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: Lenny sees Nadya. He gasps. Excited.

dialogues.speaker: LENNY
dialogues.text: There you are my gorgeous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nadya enters the apartment building.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: Lenny rushes into the --

dialogues.speaker: FOYER
dialogues.text: -- where he peers through the peephole in the front door.

dialogues.speaker: THROUGH PEEPHOLE
dialogues.text: Teary eyed, Nadya walks up to the door next to LennyвЂ™s.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: LennyвЂ™s glued to the peephole. At the sound of NadyaвЂ™ closing, he hurries into the --

dialogues.speaker: KITCHEN
dialogues.text: Lenny takes a calender off the wall. Behind it is a peeph Wide eyed, he peeks through it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nadya enters the kitchen. She has a cell phone to her ear

dialogues.speaker: NADYA
dialogues.text: Please, Mike. DonвЂ™t do this to me. We can make it work... Please...donвЂ™t hang up. Nadya sags to the floor, cries.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: Lenny watches Nadya.

dialogues.speaker: LENNY
dialogues.text: Let him go. HeвЂ™s not the right one. IвЂ™m the one for you...please donвЂ™t cry.

dialogues.speaker: THROUGH PEEPHOLE
dialogues.text: Nadya manages to get up on shaky legs. She staggers out o the kitchen.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: Lenny peels away from the peephole. He hurries into the -

dialogues.speaker: BEDROOM
dialogues.text: The bedroom is dark. The only light comes through the win The walls are covered in pictures, but itвЂ™s too dark to out what they are of. Lenny removes a picture on the wall. Behind it is a peeph He peers through it.

dialogues.speaker: LENNY
dialogues.text: What are you doing princess? DonвЂ™t be upset. IвЂ™m right here.

dialogues.speaker: THROUGH PEEPHOLE
dialogues.text: Nadya pulls the drawer out of the night stand. Picks up a prescription bottle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lenny stares wide eyed through the peephole.

dialogues.speaker: LENNY
dialogues.text: What is that? No. No. What are you doing. He dashes off into the --

dialogues.speaker: BATHROOM
dialogues.text: -- where he removes a towel from a towel rack. Another peephole is behind it. Lenny peeks through the tiny hole.

dialogues.speaker: THROUGH PEEPHOLE
dialogues.text: Nadya appears in her bathroom. She has her phone, the pil bottle and a bottle of wine. She puts the bottles on the of the tub. Turns the water on. She sits down on top of the toilet, dials a number. She s as she waits.

dialogues.speaker: NADYA
dialogues.text: Please answer the phone, Mike. I love you...you love me, you know that. If you donвЂ™t answer, I canвЂ™t go on...1IвЂ™1l end it right here. Now. She hangs up the phone.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: LennyвЂ™s face is pressed to the wall.

dialogues.speaker: LENNY
dialogues.text: Princess, donвЂ™t talk like that. DonвЂ™t do anything stupid. IвЂ™m right here. IвЂ™1l do anything for you. Lenny presses his face even harder against the wall. Gasp then quivers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nadya takes her clothes off. Slips into the tub. She grab the pill bottle, empties out the contents in her hand. Sh puts al the pills in her mouth, washes them down with win straight from the bottle. Nadya lays her head back. Closes her eyes.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: LennyвЂ™s horrified. He bangs his fist on the wall.

dialogues.speaker: LENNY
dialogues.text: No! He pushes away from the wall. Paces back and forth then p through the hole again.

dialogues.speaker: THROUGH PEEPHOLE
dialogues.text: Nadya takes another mouthful of wine. SheвЂ™s groggy. Her eyelids heavy.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: Lenny runs out of the bathroom. He returns in a few secon He has his cell phone in his hand. Lenny paces for a moment then stops. He dials 9...1... He hesitates. Pushes вЂњend callвЂќ.

dialogues.speaker: LENNY
dialogues.text: TheyвЂ™d ask how I know. He hurries back to the peephole. Peers through it.

dialogues.speaker: LENNY
dialogues.text: NO! Nadya! Wake up!

dialogues.speaker: THROUGH PEEPHOLE
dialogues.text: Nadya lies lifeless in the tub. The wine bottle dropped o the floor.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: Lenny staggers back from the wall in horror. Suddenly he rushes out of the bathroom into the --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lenny yanks the door open. Darts outside.

dialogues.speaker: LATER
dialogues.text: Lenny carries NadyaвЂ™s wet body wrapped in a towel. He w into the --

dialogues.speaker: BEDROOM
dialogues.text: -- where he gently puts her body down on the bed. Covers with the towel. He carefully moves her wet hair away from face. Kisses her forehead. Still dressed, Lenny lies down on the bed next to Nadya. takes her hand in his.

dialogues.speaker: LENNY
dialogues.text: I loved you from the first time I saw you. I think about that moment every day. He squeezes her hand.

dialogues.speaker: LENNY
dialogues.text: You were going into your apartment. I was leaving mine. You dropped your mail and I picked it up and handed it to you. Your hand touched mine and you looked me in the eyes and smiled. He turns towards her. Studies her face.

dialogues.speaker: LENNY
dialogues.text: No girl has ever done that to me before. They lie in the dark together. INT. APARTMENT вЂ”- BEDROOM - DAY The early morning sun brings light into the room. Lenny a Nadya are in the bed. Lenny sleeps. Nadya still dead. Pull back to reveal all the pictures on the walls are of Nadya taken by an obsessed individual.
